trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of temporary files.
trans-unit.target: 表示暫存檔案的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> can be used to generate unique file names and to keep track of a list of files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> 可用來產生唯一的檔案名稱以及要追蹤的檔案清單。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful to <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> implementers when managing a list of compiler-generated intermediate files, which are sometimes deleted after use.
trans-unit.target: 這可以用於<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>實施者管理的編譯器產生中繼檔案清單，有時會在使用後刪除時。

trans-unit.source: To specify a directory to generate unique temporary file names in, use an appropriately overloaded constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要產生唯一的暫存檔名的目錄，請使用適當的多載的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: You can also use a constructor overload to indicate whether files added to the collection should, if not specified otherwise when using the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%2A> or <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A> methods, be deleted when the collection is disposed or the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用建構函式多載，以指出是否加入至集合的檔案應該如果未指定，否則使用時<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%2A>或<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A>方法，集合已處置時，才能刪除或<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A file in any directory can be added to an instance of <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> using the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以加入任何目錄中的檔案執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection>使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To generate a unique name for a temporary file of a particular file extension, call <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A> and specifiy the extension of the file name to generate.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生的暫存檔案的特定副檔名的唯一名稱，請呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A>並指定要產生的檔案名稱的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A> method will return a string consisting of a full path to a file name of the specified extension in the directory specified by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.TempDir%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A>方法會傳回字串，其中包含所指定的目錄中指定之副檔名的檔案名稱的完整路徑<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.TempDir%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A> method will only return one unique file name per file name extension.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A>方法只會傳回一個唯一的檔案名稱，每個檔案的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%2A> and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A> methods have overloads that allow you to specify whether the files should be deleted when the collection is disposed or the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%2A>和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A>方法具有多載，可讓您指定在處置集合時，是否應該刪除的檔案或<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A> method will delete all the files in the collection except those that are marked to be kept.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A>方法會刪除除外標記為要保留集合中的所有檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.BasePath%2A> property indicates a full path to the base file name, without a file name extension, used to generate the file names returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.BasePath%2A>屬性會指出基底檔案名稱，不含檔案名稱副檔名，用來產生所傳回的檔案名稱的完整路徑<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>立即呼叫者或衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> class and the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A> and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection>類別和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A>和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: for deriving from the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 針對衍生自<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" />類別。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" />: <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />;<see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" />: <see langword="FullTrust" />.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is a default constructor that initializes the collection with default settings.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設建構函式會初始化具有預設設定的集合。

trans-unit.source: By default, this temporary files collection will store the files in a default temporary directory and will delete the temporary files after they have been generated and used.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此暫存檔案集合會將檔案儲存在預設的暫存目錄，而且它們有產生並使用後刪除暫存檔案。

trans-unit.source: A path to the temporary directory to use for storing the temporary files.
trans-unit.target: 用來儲存暫存檔的暫存目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> class using the specified temporary directory that is set to delete the temporary files after their generation and use, by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設設定在暫存檔產生並使用過後加以刪除的指定暫存目錄，初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A path to the temporary directory to use for storing the temporary files.
trans-unit.target: 用來儲存暫存檔的暫存目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the temporary files should be kept after use; <see langword="false" /> if the temporary files should be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果暫存檔應該在使用後保留，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果暫存檔應該在使用後刪除，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> class using the specified temporary directory and specified value indicating whether to keep or delete the temporary files after their generation and use, by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的暫存目錄，以及指示是否要在暫存檔產生並使用過後加以保留或刪除的指定值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of `keepFiles` is used to set the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 值`keepFiles`用來設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A>參數。

trans-unit.source: The temporary files in the collection are retained or deleted upon the completion of compiler activity based on the value of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A> property in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的暫存檔案要保留或刪除完成時的值為基礎的編譯器活動<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A>集合中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: As each file is added to the collection, the current value of <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A> is associated with it, unless it is added with a method that has a `keepFile` parameter, in which case that value is used for that specific file.
trans-unit.target: 將每個檔案加入至集合中，目前的值<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A>是相關聯，除非加入方法，該方法具有`keepFile`參數，在此情況下，值會用於該特定檔案。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A> method is called, if <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A> is `true`, all files are deleted, including those added with a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A> value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A>呼叫方法時，如果<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A>是`true`，會刪除所有檔案，包括加入<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A>值`true`。

trans-unit.source: This allows specific files, those identified as being keep files, to be temporarily retained after compilation for purposes such as error reporting, then deleted when they are no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓特定的檔案，這些識別為保留的檔案，以暫時保留進行錯誤報告，例如在編譯後再刪除不再需要時。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Adds a file name with the specified file name extension to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將具有指定副檔名的檔名加入至集合中。

trans-unit.source: The file name extension for the auto-generated temporary file name to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入集合之自動產生暫存檔名的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: Adds a file name with the specified file name extension to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將具有指定副檔名的檔名加入至集合中。

trans-unit.source: A file name with the specified extension that was just added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定副檔名的檔名，這個檔名剛加入至集合中。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a file name with the specified extension that has been added to the temporary files collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回具有指定之副檔名已加入至暫存檔集合的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Other code must still create the file before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: 其他程式碼必須仍會建立檔案，才可以使用。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called only once for each file name extension, because it will return the same name if it is called with the same extension.
trans-unit.target: 因為它會傳回相同的名稱，如果呼叫使用相同的副檔名，則可以針對每個檔案名稱副檔名，一次呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The file name extension for the auto-generated temporary file name to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入集合之自動產生暫存檔名的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file should be kept after use; <see langword="false" /> if the file should be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案應該在使用後保留，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果檔案應該刪除，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a file name with the specified file name extension to the collection, using the specified value indicating whether the file should be deleted or retained.
trans-unit.target: 使用指示是否應該刪除或保留檔案的指定值，將具有指定副檔名的檔名加入集合中。

trans-unit.source: A file name with the specified extension that was just added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定副檔名的檔名，這個檔名剛加入至集合中。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a file name with the specified extension that has been added to the temporary files collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回具有指定之副檔名已加入至暫存檔集合的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Other code must still create the file before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: 其他程式碼必須仍會建立檔案，才可以使用。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called only once for each file name extension, because it will return the same name if it is called with the same extension.
trans-unit.target: 因為它會傳回相同的名稱，如果呼叫使用相同的副檔名，則可以針對每個檔案名稱副檔名，一次呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fileExtension" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileExtension" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合中的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file should be kept after use; <see langword="false" /> if the file should be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案應該在使用後保留，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果檔案應該刪除，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified file to the collection, using the specified value indicating whether to keep the file after the collection is disposed or when the <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 使用指示在處置集合或呼叫 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete" /> 方法之後是否保留檔案的指定值，將指定檔案加入集合中。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method to add a file that is to be kept to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddFile%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法可加入至集合中保留的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fileName" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileName" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="fileName" /> is a duplicate.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileName" /> 已重複。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full path to the base file name, without a file name extension, on the temporary directory path, that is used to generate temporary file names for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在暫存檔目錄中，取得主檔名 (沒有副檔名) 的完整路徑，用於產生集合的暫存檔名。

trans-unit.source: The full path to the base file name, without a file name extension, on the temporary directory path, that is used to generate temporary file names for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在暫存目錄路徑中，主檔名 (沒有副檔名) 的完整路徑用於產生集合的暫存檔名。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.BasePath" /> property has not been set or is set to <see langword="null" />, and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.AllAccess" /> is not granted for the temporary directory indicated by the <see cref="P:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.TempDir" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 若未設定 <see cref="P:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.BasePath" /> 屬性或將其設為 <see langword="null" />，且未按 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.AllAccess" /> 屬性的指示將 <see cref="P:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.TempDir" /> 授與暫存目錄。

trans-unit.source: The array of strings to copy to.
trans-unit.target: 複製的目的字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index of the array to begin copying to.
trans-unit.target: 要開始複製的目的陣列索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the members of the collection to the specified string, beginning at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合的成員複製到指定的字串，從指定的索引開始。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of files in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的檔案數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of files in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的檔案數目。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the temporary files within this collection that were not marked to be kept.
trans-unit.target: 刪除這個集合中未標記成保留的暫存檔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A> method examines each file in the collection to determine, on an individual basis, whether the file is to be kept or deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A>方法會檢查以判斷是否要保留或刪除檔案，個別地集合中的每個檔案。

trans-unit.source: Files can be explicitly marked to be kept when added to the collection using add methods that take a `keepFile` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 檔案可以明確地標示為要加入至集合的使用將採用的方法時，保留`keepFile`參數。

trans-unit.source: When adding a file to the collection using the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A> overload that does not have a `keepFile` parameter the value of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A> property is used as the default keep file indicator.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案加入至集合時<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A>沒有多載`keepFile`參數值的<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A>屬性做為預設保留檔案指標。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 <see langword="Dispose" /> 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to delete the temporary files before this object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在記憶體回收重新宣告物件前，嘗試刪除暫存檔。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>並清除資源，藉由呼叫`Dispose(false)`。

trans-unit.source: Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自訂清除。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can enumerate the members of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得一個列舉值，列舉集合成員。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that contains the collection's members.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，包含集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to keep the files, by default, when the <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete" /> method is called or the collection is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete" /> 方法或處置集合時，根據預設值取得或設定值，指出是否保留檔案。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the files should be kept; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該保留檔案，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A> property is used as the default value when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A> overload that does not have a `keepFile` parameter is called to add a temporary file to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A>屬性做為預設值時<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.AddExtension%2A>沒有多載`keepFile`參數呼叫暫存檔案加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Each temporary file in the collection has an associated keep file flag that determines, on a per-file basis, whether that file is to be kept or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 每個集合中的暫存檔案有關聯的保留檔案旗標來判斷是否要保留或刪除該檔案，以每個檔案為基礎。

trans-unit.source: Files are automatically kept or deleted on completion of the compilation based on their associated keep files value.
trans-unit.target: 檔案會自動保留或刪除上完成編譯根據其關聯的保留檔案的值。

trans-unit.source: However, after compilation is complete, files that were kept can be released by setting <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A> false and calling the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，編譯完成之後，保留的檔案可以釋放藉由設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.KeepFiles%2A>false，且呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection.Delete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This will result in all files being deleted.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致刪除所有檔案。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，是從 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 複製過來之項目的目的端。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零起始的索引，即複製的起始處。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to an array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 從目標陣列之指定的索引開始，將集合的項目複製到陣列。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 中所包含的項目數。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示是否同步化存取集合 (執行緒安全)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，這個物件可以用來對集合進行同步存取。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用以同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，可用於逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 執行與釋放 (Free)、釋放 (Release) 或重設 Unmanaged 資源相關聯之應用程式定義的工作。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.IDisposable> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the temporary directory to store the temporary files in.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來儲存暫存檔的暫存目錄。

trans-unit.source: The temporary directory to store the temporary files in.
trans-unit.target: 用來儲存暫存檔的暫存目錄。
